calendar.name: Information and Intelligence

administrivia.item: [img id="twitter-logo" src="../../../images/little_bird.png" alt='' /] Follow course announcements on twitter.

calendar.event: [strong]First Class Meeting[/strong] [br/]Course introduction and [a href='./syllabus.php']syllabus[/a] review. [br/]Submit the [a href='Resources/contact_information.pdf']contact information[/a] sheet.

Read the [a href='./syllabus.php'] syllabus for the course[/a] and come to class prepared to answer questions about it. [br/]Read the [a href='Resources/lanier-1.pdf'] excerpt from Jaron Lanier’s [em]You Are Not a Gadget[/em][/a] and come to class prepared to discuss it.
Discuss Morse Code Speed project; Ohm’s Law.
[a href='Assignment_03.php']Morse Code Speed[/a] lab session [br/]Meet in classroom first
[a href='Assignment_03.php']Morse Code Speed[/a] lab session [br/]Meet in classroom first
Arduino function definitions; Debugging with [a href='http://arduino.cc/en/reference/serial']Arduino Serial functions[/a] [br/]Using code to automate tasks. What is beautiful code?

Cutoff date for submitting SOS Speed project for credit [br/][a href='Assignment_04.php']Assignment 4[/a] Due [br/][a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DMyGUtxX64zWHl5MbfvWrBnjb7zxqppCjB-Tz0Z22wk/edit?usp=sharing'] Class Notes[/a]
[a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/18t6mE1BsskDFGJx0HpxbMUl4qGFu2GhSvaN_2ozfIao/edit?usp=sharing'] Class Notes[/a] [br/][a href='Assignment_05.php']Start Binary Counter Project[/a]

[a href='http://ed.ted.com/on/Z9XSA997#watch']TED-Ed BBC Information Video Assignment[/a] Due [br/] Optional: [a href='http://ed.ted.com/on/qNuI3O0H']TED-Ed Assignment on writing a paper[/a] [br/] [a href='https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B28CAPM6eyUPcUU1czliT0FLN0E/view?usp=sharing']Lizandra’s Class Notes[/a]

[a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rrmScd-uJqpMq06yYMgDb8lNxgW_uWo8YnP-7aZY-0I/edit?usp=sharing'] Thesis Statement[/a] due if you chose the final paper option. [br/] [a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xmVJ_sRLdcE7ogc_HHvBjYqEcs0ElK_p_XrB1c124C0/edit?usp=sharing'] Class Notes[/a] Artificial Intelligence
[strong]Last Class Meeting[/strong] [br/]Lab Session and Review [br/] [a href='http://www.qc.cuny.edu/evaluate']Course Evaluations[/a]

CSCI 100 Final Exam[br/]11:00 am - 1:00 pm [br/] [a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sdck5z4dy8XXBkQKZlKBPVw0hqJHouP_9LYRk0LD3kw/edit?usp=sharing'] Exam Topics[/a] [br/] [a href='https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rrmScd-uJqpMq06yYMgDb8lNxgW_uWo8YnP-7aZY-0I/edit?usp=sharing'] Final Project or Paper[/a] Due
